name: Star Invaders (whatthesamuel)
description:
You have to click the game once to play it on browser. Use arrow keys to scroll through menu.

Using the bomb costs you 500 points. Leveling up restores 1 health.

Try to get to level 10 with the highest score!

Tested working on latest version of Firefox (on 9/19/2020). If you encounter any bugs or errors please leave a comment!

///////////Description///////

This is a game to fit the jam theme: "70s-90s games". I mixed space invaders with bullet-hell genre. I haven't played a lot of bullet hell games, so this is my best guess at what they might be like. Feel free to give feedback and share your thoughts!
